description: Chinese wines are gaining credibility for their quality. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Red, white and bubbly: Wines from China flow into Singapore restaurants
title_page: Red, white and bubbly: Wines from China flow into Singapore restaurants | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – If the names Legacy Peak, Silver Heights, Longting Vineyard, Celebre and Domaine de Long Dai do not sound familiar to you as a wine drinker, brace yourself.
Restaurants in Singapore – and not just Chinese ones – are adding grape wines from China to their wine lists, organising dinners pairing their food with these wines and inviting winemakers to speak about their craft to diners.
